about_the_game:
Warning: OVRDARK is an intense virtual reality game that may cause dizziness or discomfort in some individuals. It is strongly recommended that players take regular breaks during the gaming session to prevent visual fatigue and potential adverse effects. If you experience dizziness, nausea, or discomfort, it is advised to immediately stop playing and take a rest. The health and well-being of players are of utmost importance. Play responsibly and enjoy OVRDARK safely!

Immerse yourself in the chilling and exclusive virtual reality sequel to "DO NOT OPEN". Get ready to experience an even more terrifying journey in "OVRDARK", where horror and tension reach new heights as you explore the cursed mansion of Burkittsville in full immersion.

"OVRDARK" is the sequel to the acclaimed game "DO NOT OPEN", taking the series to new horrors and challenges in the world of virtual reality. Step into the shoes of George Foster, a fearless investigator and companion of Mike Goreng, who ventures into the mansion after the shocking events of the first game. However, what he encounters is far more sinister than anticipated.

As you delve into the dark depths of the mansion, you will face the malevolent presence of Mike Goreng, your former companion who has now become a ruthless enemy. Utilize the advancements of virtual reality technology to fully immerse yourself in the horror, feeling every chill and racing heartbeat.

Explore terrifying rooms and solve twisted puzzles as you fight for your survival. Virtual reality will plunge you into a nightmarish world where every shadow may conceal a deadly danger. Experience tangible fear as you confront your worst nightmares in "OVRDARK".

Embark on the ultimate virtual reality experience as you uncover the macabre connection between "OVRDARK" and "DO NOT OPEN". Only the brave will unravel the dark secrets of the mansion and escape its deadly embrace.

Warning: "OVRDARK" is an extremely intense and terrifying virtual reality experience, and discretion is advised. Prepare yourself to dive into the chilling sequel to "DO NOT OPEN" and confront horror in its most immersive form. Do you have the courage to survive "OVRDARK"?

highlighted.name: By the skin of my teeth
There is no room in hell

content_descriptors.notes:
Depictions of suicide and self-harm can be found in the game. 
Players are able to smoke cigarettes in first-person.
Elements such as blood, gore images, gratuitous and genre are present during the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, OpenXR (except HTC Vive). oVRdark is NOT compatible with STEAM LINK app.
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Specs are for VR, lower Specs may not work for VR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, OpenXR (except HTC Vive). oVRdark is NOT compatible with STEAM LINK app.

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Temas sensíveis
Linguagem imprópria

reviews:
“If you're looking for a slow burn, tension filled, VR survival horror adventure with light puzzle solving and some cool jump scares then OVRDARK should tick all the right boxes for you.”
Beardo Benjo

“A surprise horror hit”
Jammyhero

“I had a brilliant time with OVRDARK, the puzzles are great, the graphics are nice and the scares were awesome”
Gamertag VR
short_description: OVRDARK: Dive into the chilling sequel to 'DO NOT OPEN' in this intense VR experience. Explore a cursed mansion, face your former companion turned ruthless enemy, and unravel dark secrets. Can you survive the ultimate horror in virtual reality?
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*, French, Italian, German, Greek, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
*languages with full audio support
